nodes.text: The Moff High Council meeting chambers was a conference room in the New Imperial Palace where members of the Moff Council held their meetings by 137 ABY.

It was in this location that Darth Maladi, via holographic transmission, ordered the Moff Council to cancel the search for Cade Skywalker. Following High Moff's Morlish Veed's rise to the rank of Imperial Regent, Veed held a Council meeting in which he informed the Moffs of Operation: Thunderstroke, a plan to capture Roan Fel, and that he had been informed about the existence of a spy among Imperial ranks.
